articles.title: Shami to be rested for Bengal's opening Vijay Hazare Trophy game
articles.description: He will sit out of the match against Delhi on December 21 in Hyderabad

articles.title: 2024 showed us that 2025 belongs to Doechii
articles.description: The TDE rapper is the breakout star of 2024

articles.title: Enough is enough: Benching Quinn Ewers won’t fix Texas’ red-zone woes
articles.description: As Texas grapples with red-zone inefficiencies, the real solution lies in a deeper look at offensive balance, not a quarterback change.
